verses.verse: Then <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
If we <S%H5254>assay<s%> to <S%H1697>commune<s%> with you, will you be <S%H3811>grieved?<s%> but <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H6113>withhold<s%> himself from <S%H4405>speaking?<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> you have <S%H3256>instructed<s%> <S%H7227>many,<s%> and you have <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H7504>weak<s%> <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
Your <S%H4405>words<s%> have <S%H6965>upheld<s%> him that was <S%H3782>falling,<s%> and you have <S%H553>strengthened<s%> the <S%H3766>feeble<s%> <S%H1290>knees.<s%>
But <S%H6258>now<s%> it is <S%H935>come<s%> on you, and you <S%H3811>faint;<s%> it <S%H5060>touches<s%> you, and you are <S%H926>troubled.<s%>
Is not this your <S%H3374>fear,<s%> your <S%H3690>confidence,<s%> your <S%H8615>hope,<s%> and the <S%H8537>uprightness<s%> of your <S%H1870>ways?<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H4310>who<s%> ever <S%H6>perished,<s%> being <S%H5355>innocent?<s%> or <S%H375>where<s%> were the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H3582>cut<s%> off?
Even as I have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> they that <S%H2790>plow<s%> <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H5999>wickedness,<s%> <S%H7114>reap<s%> the same.
By the <S%H5397>blast<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> they <S%H6>perish,<s%> and by the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of his <S%H639>nostrils<s%> are they <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>

The <S%H7581>roaring<s%> of the <S%H738>lion,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7826>fierce<s%> <S%H7826>lion,<s%> and the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of the <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions,<s%> are <S%H5421>broken.<s%>
The old <S%H3918>lion<s%> <S%H6>perishes<s%> for <S%H1097>lack<s%> of <S%H2964>prey,<s%> and the stout <S%H3833>lion's<s%> <S%H1121>whelps<s%> are <S%H6504>scattered<s%> <S%H6504>abroad.<s%>
Now a <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H1589>secretly<s%> <S%H1589>brought<s%> to me, and my <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H3947>received<s%> a <S%H8102>little<s%> thereof.
In <S%H5587>thoughts<s%> from the <S%H2384>visions<s%> of the <S%H3915>night,<s%> when <S%H8639>deep<s%> <S%H8639>sleep<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%>
<S%H6343>Fear<s%> <S%H7122>came<s%> on me, and <S%H7460>trembling,<s%> which made <S%H7230>all<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> to <S%H6342>shake.<s%>
Then a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H2498>passed<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> my <S%H6440>face;<s%> the <S%H8185>hair<s%> of my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H5568>stood<s%> up:

It <S%H5975>stood<s%> still, but I could not <S%H5234>discern<s%> the <S%H4758>form<s%> thereof: an <S%H8544>image<s%> was <S%H5048>before<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> there was <S%H1827>silence,<s%> and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6963>voice,<s%> saying,
Shall <S%H582>mortal<s%> <S%H582>man<s%> be more <S%H6663>just<s%> than <S%H433>God?<s%> shall a <S%H1400>man<s%> be more <S%H2891>pure<s%> than his <S%H6213>maker?<s%>
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> he put <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H539>trust<s%> in his <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and his <S%H4397>angels<s%> he <S%H7760>charged<s%> with <S%H8417>folly:<s%>

<S%H637>How<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> less in them that <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H2563>clay,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3247>foundation<s%> is in the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> which are <S%H1792>crushed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6211>moth?<s%>
They are <S%H3807>destroyed<s%> from <S%H1242>morning<s%> to <S%H6153>evening:<s%> they <S%H6>perish<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%> without any <S%H7760>regarding<s%> it.
Does not their <S%H3499>excellency<s%> which is in them <S%H5265>go<s%> <S%H5265>away?<s%> they <S%H4191>die,<s%> even <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
